name: Hormonposten: Veien til Kirkenes
description:
In an alternate universe Norway, a well known but criticised health service has finally allowed anyone to get hormones, with one catch. All deliveries must be done through Hormonposten. A postal service banned from using any means of transport except for their feet. You are a courier for Hormonposten, and you've just been assigned a delivery to Kirkenes, a 20 day journey.

Made for Yeet Riksen Jam, organized by Skeive Spillutviklere

This game was made in response to the current state of trans care in Norway. Read more: https://kjonnsinkongruens.no/political-platform/

Thanks to seansleblanc on itch.io for the Better Minimal WebGL Template.
